wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Emlyn Hooson, Baron Hooson,  (26 March 1925 – 21 February 2012) was a Welsh Liberal and then Liberal Democrat politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Montgomeryshire from 1962 until 1979.

link_mentions.page: List of crossings of the River Severn
response: |Previously known as the 'First Bridge on the Severn'. Opened May 1992 by Lady Hooson, wife of Emlyn Hooson, Baron Hooson. Also carries Severn Way long-distance footpath from right bank to left bank when heading downstream. The Wye Valley Walk long-distance footpath starts here.
|Emlyn Hooson, Baron Hooson||of Montgomery in the County of Powys||1979||2012
